SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnUpdateNeededListener, Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable, OnUpdateNeededListener

Class used to represent the living room board for each game.

Standard board dimension are:

  • 9: for rows
  • 9: for columns

However, the board is composed of 45 board square or cells. Each board square is associated with a type, which depends on the numbers of players in the game. The default version of the board is represented in init matrix.

Since:
14/04/2023
Version:
5.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • isOkay

      private boolean isOkay(int i, int j, int numPlayers)
      Method that returns true if the selected board square in board (which is the cell having index of row i and column j) can contain a tile according to the number of players in the game.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the row in the board.
      j - index of the column in the board.
      numPlayers - number of players in the game.
      Returns:
      true if and only if the board square type can contain a tile.

    • removeSelectedTileSubject

      public List<TileSubject> removeSelectedTileSubject(List<Coordinate> taken)
      Method used to remove some selected tiles form the board.
      Parameters:
      taken - list of coordinates of the tiles that need to be removed from the board.
      Returns:
      the tiles removed from the board.
      See Also:
      • TileSubject
      • Coordinate

    • refillBoard

      public void refillBoard(int numberOfPlayers)

      Method used to refill the board using tiles from bag when on the board there are only item tiles without any other adjacent tile, i.e. it is only possible to take single tiles.

      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - number of the player in the game, used to refill the board properly according to the BoardSquareType.
